Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Joe Biden was waving to an empty field when he actually was waving to a group of firefighters and ground personnel.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or context to support the assertion that Joe Biden was waving to an empty field.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that Joe Biden was intentionally waving to an empty field, without considering the possibility that there may have been people just out of frame.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider the alternative explanation that Joe Biden was waving to a group of firefighters and ground personnel, which was confirmed by an Associated Press reporter and a CNN reporter covering the Biden campaign.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Joe Biden was not waving to an empty field, as confirmed by multiple sources and video evidence.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating bias in this claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times bias in this claim.
